title: INC-20260119-ACME-0001 — CLEAR sanctions + USD buffer breach → HOLD
resolution_notes: Pending treasury review. Options: delay to T+1, partial release, or override with Head of Treasury approval.
content: Emergency payment TXN-EMRG-001 to ACME Trading LLC for USD 250,000 submitted at 10:25 UTC on 2026-01-19. Beneficiary is a new counterparty with no prior transaction history. Sanctions screening returned CLEAR with 0% match confidence. Liquidity gate assessment: starting balance USD 2,200,000, projected balance after payment USD 1,950,000, minimum buffer threshold USD 2,000,000. Buffer breach detected with gap of USD 50,000. Cutoff time for USD SWIFT is 15:00 UTC. Per runbook_emergency_payment.md Section 6.1, payment placed on HOLD pending Treasury Manager review. Options presented: (A) delay to next business day, (B) partial release of USD 150,000 to maintain buffer, (C) request intercompany funding from GroupTreasuryCo, (D) override with documented business justification requiring Treasury Manager + Head of Treasury dual approval per policy_approval_matrix.md. Audit bundle initiated with sanctions tool run ID san-4d91b8c7, liquidity tool run ID liq-a1b2c3d4, and policy citations attached.
